sqlMap.select: SELECT B.BIN_CampaignRuleID AS campRuleId, B.SubCampaignName AS subCampaignName, B.validFlag FROM Campaign.BIN_Campaign A, Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule B WHERE A.BIN_CampaignID = #campaignId# AND A.BIN_CampaignID = B.BIN_CampaignID

SELECT A.SubCampaignName, A.SubCampaignCode, A.LocalValidRule, A.IsCollectInfo, A.SubCampaignType, A.SubCampaignValid, A.Description, A.Times, A.TopLimit, A.PriceControl, A.SaleBatchNo, isnull(A.DeliveryPrice,0) AS DeliveryPrice, isnull(A.DeliveryPoints,0) AS DeliveryPoints FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule A where A.BIN_CampaignRuleID=#subCampId#
sqlMap.sql: SELECT B.BIN_ProductVendorID AS proId, B.BarCode AS barCode, B.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.SaleType AS prtType, ISNULL(B.RewardType,'1') AS rewardType, D.PromotionCateCD AS prmCate, CASE WHEN D.PromotionCateCD IN('TZZK','DHCP','DHMY') THEN ISNULL(B.Price,0) * -1 ELSE ISNULL(B.Price,0) END AS price, B.Quantity AS quantity, CASE WHEN B.SaleType = 'P' THEN D.IsStock ELSE F.IsStock END AS isStock, CASE WHEN D.PromotionCateCD IN('DHCP','DHMY') THEN D.ExPoint END AS exPoint, ISNULL(D.NameTotal,F.NameTotal) AS nameTotal, A.SubCampaignCode AS subCampCode, B.GroupType AS groupType, B.LogicOpt AS logicOpt, B.GroupNo AS groupNo, B.DeliveryType AS deliveryType FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule A JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_CampaignRuleID=B.BIN_CampaignRuleID AND B.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.BIN_ProductVendorID=C.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID AND B.SaleType = 'P') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct D WITH(NOLOCK) ON (C.BIN_PromotionProductID=D.BIN_PromotionProductID) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor E WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.BIN_ProductVendorID=E.BIN_ProductVendorID AND B.SaleType = 'N') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Product F WITH(NOLOCK) ON (E.BIN_ProductID=F.BIN_ProductID)
sqlMap.select: SELECT D.PropertyName AS propName, C.BIN_CampaignBasePropID AS propId, C.BasePropValue1 AS propValue, C.ActLocationType AS conType, E.ConditionInfo AS conInfo FROM Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition C JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignBaseProp D ON(C.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = D.BIN_CampaignBasePropID AND D.PropertyName = 'baseProp_customer' AND D.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_SearchLog E ON(C.BasePropValue1 = E.BIN_SearchCode AND E.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE C.BIN_CampaignRuleID=#subCampId# AND C.ValidFlag='1' UNION SELECT TOP 1 D.PropertyName AS propName, C.BIN_CampaignBasePropID AS propId, C.BasePropValue1 AS propValue, C.ActLocationType AS conType, '' AS conInfo FROM Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition C JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignBaseProp D ON(C.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = D.BIN_CampaignBasePropID AND D.PropertyName in ('baseProp_city','baseProp_counter','baseProp_channal','baseProp_faction') AND D.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE C.BIN_CampaignRuleID=#subCampId# AND C.ValidFlag='1'

SELECT A.BasePropValue1 AS placeCode, B.CounterNameIF AS placeName FROM Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition A JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo B ON(A.BasePropValue1 = B.CounterCode AND B.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#) WHERE A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = #subCampId# AND A.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = #propId# AND A.ActLocationType = #conType# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT C.ChannelName AS placeName FROM Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition A JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel C ON(A.BasePropValue1 = C.BIN_ChannelID AND C.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#) WHERE A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = #subCampId# AND A.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = #propId# AND A.ActLocationType = #conType# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BasePropValue1 AS id FROM Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition A WHERE A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = #subCampId# AND A.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = #propId# AND A.ActLocationType = #conType# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT D.RegionNameChinese AS placeName FROM Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition A JOIN Basis.BIN_Region D ON(A.BasePropValue1 = D.BIN_RegionID AND D.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#) WHERE A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = #subCampId# AND A.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = #propId# AND A.ActLocationType = #conType# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT TOP 1 SubCampaignType AS subCampaignType, IsCollectInfo AS isCollectInfo, LocalValidRule AS localValidRule, SubCampaignValid AS subCampaignValid FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule WHERE BIN_CampaignID = #campaignId#
